## BindingSource type

Source for the binding, including the type and value

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BindingSource<T> = ConstantBindingSource<T> | DynamicValueBindingSource<T> | ClassBindingSource<T> | ProviderBindingSource<T> | AliasBindingSource<T>;
```
